name: huggingface_scrape_model
description: Scrape a specific model page on Hugging Face. Returns model info, tags, downloads, and model card summary.

steps.code: const title = document.querySelector('h1')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const tags = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="/models?"]')).slice(0, 10).map(t => t.textContent.trim()); const dlEl = document.querySelector('[title*="download"], [title*="Download"]'); const downloads = dlEl?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const likesEl = document.querySelector('button[title*="Like"], button[title*="like"]'); const likes = likesEl?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const card = document.querySelector('.prose')?.innerText?.substring(0, 2000) || ''; return { model_id: '{{model_id}}', title, tags, downloads, likes, model_card_summary: card, url: window.location.href };
